What is a Memory Card Game?

content.content: is a simple yet challenging activity where you flip cards to find identical pairs. The goal is to match the card correctly, testing your memory and focus.

MatchTheCard.content: How to Play Match the Card Games

content: Shuffle all cards and place them face down.
Flip two cards at a time.
If both match, keep the pair and continue.
If not, flip them back and remember their positions.
Continue until all pairs are found.
